PRIVACY POLICY

This official document was created by the app owner to inform the user about all the terms and conditions regarding the user’s personal and non-personal data. Privacy Policy describes all the main ways, in which his data is processed, gathered and shared. Its aim is establishing lawful relationships between the owner and the user.

If someone intends to install and use Menter application, then he has to agree with all the statements from this document first. This is extremely important, as reading the entire text helps prevent undesirable aftermaths for both sides (e.g., law disputes). If the user installs the product we distribute, this means that he fully accepts the terms. This happens automatically. So, the user should read the current document to be aware of each statement.

Updates
Privacy Policy is the only relevant one. However, we reserve the right to update it without prior notification. If the user disagrees with the new terms, then he has to contact us right away. In addition, he isn’t allowed to use the program and any of its services during that time. If he continues using the product, then this means that he accepts the terms automatically. Please, check this page from time to time to be aware of legitimate Privacy Policy.

Which data do we need?
1. Personal data, which helps identify the user. This is required for providing him/her with the most convenient service according to the individual needs. Such data includes the user’s name, age, geolocation, etc. We can obtain it from a variety of sources: the user’s letters, requests, different open sources, etc.
2. Technical information about the device, on which Menter is installed. We need to collect the following: the iOS version, hardware model, other technical details.
3. Information about usage activity. We have to track how the user interacts with our application and the website.
4. Log Data (crash information)

Cookies
Each time the user visits this website, interacts with the application we created or just launches it, we use cookies. Such tracking technologies help customize service and make the usage more user-friendly.

How do we use the data?
We collect, use and store the user’s personal data in order to provide the best level of service according to the device requirements, individual needs and preferences. One more reason for us to collect the data is to track any kind of fraudulent activity regarding our intellectual and physical property. This also helps assure the highest level of safety of the user’s personal data. The owner’s property includes: the application (Menter), its official website, accounts and other materials. Such data is also required for analytics and statistics. This helps improve the distribution of the product and make it effective enough.
Special time-limited promotional offers can be created only according to the user’s information, as they should be carried out on an individual basis. So, we need the gathered data for in-app advertising and other offers.

Third-party sources
Correct work of Menter requires visual materials. We lawfully use images from the third-party source freepik.com, which has its own Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (https://www.freepikcompany.com/legal#nav-freepik). These documents are different from ours. We also need to procure ad stream properly, thus we refer to special third-party advertising companies to solve this. Usually, they require the user’s personal information to customize their advertising service. This means that the user will get ads, which correspond to his geolocation, preferences and so on. The owner of Menter isn’t responsible for advertising content!

Safety terms
We apply all the legal and effective methods, which correspond to the international standards, in order to keep the user’s information safe, while transmitting and storing it. Nevertheless, no ideal methods, which provide absolute protection, exist.

Menter requires such permissions:
We apply all the legal and effective methods, which correspond to the international standards, in order to keep the user’s information safe, while transmitting and storing it. Nevertheless, no ideal methods, which provide absolute protection, exist.
  • Sending notifications. The user can switch this option on/off manually from the settings. Part of the functions require notifying.
  • Access to the Gallery is required to upload images to the Thank You Diary - special section of Menter.
We require only those permissions, which are important for correct work of the application. In case the user doesn’t permit access, the functionality of Menter will be limited.

User’s rights
  • All the permissions given before may be canceled by the user at any moment. In this case, the functionality of Menter may be shortened.
  • The user can get a copy of stored data after the official request.
  • The user has a right to be fully aware of data collecting and usage purposes, ways of gathering and processing, which are applied by the owner.
  • Further data usage can be forbidden. As a result, the owner will be allowed to collect and store the user’s personal and non-personal data without processing or sharing.
  • The user is free to request for updating his personal data if it is not relevant or true.
  • He is also allowed to request for the full information deletion at any moment.
  • The user can object data usage.
  • The user’s rights may be protected by the local authority in case he refers to it with an official complaint.

More information
Please, get in touch with the owner of Menter or the Support via any available contacts, which are displayed on this website. We will try to answer all questions and provide you with the required details about data use.
